entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve intellisense with grouping by method name #71806
  • Interceptor for Code Navigation for Source Generators #71805
  • Show minimum size of class/struct type as hint when hovering for C# #71804
  • Quick actions and refactoring - generate exception class creates obsolete code #71803
  • Extract interface feature shall be able to replace/update existing file #71802
  • [C# / VB]`string` and `char` constants are not embedded as literals in string interpolation #71801

Closed

  • Collection expression spreads on arrays can result in variance exceptions #71720
    17.10
  • Update roslyn syntax list constructs to support collection expressions. #71596
  • The SyntaxGenerator omits abstract modifier for event declarations #66966
    17.10
  • IDE0051 and IDE0052 are slow #67855
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Append chars more efficiently when creating strings #71812
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Append chars more efficiently when creating doc comment IDs #71811
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions for empty collections #71810
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions for empty collections #71808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Load Roslyn DevKit assemblies into the default ALC #71807
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary temporary builders when creating syntax lists. #71799
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix System.Data.SqlClient version alert #71809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dependency on IFindUsageContext from DefinitionItemExtensions #71795
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup VSIX asset inclusion #71782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Check Frame's VSFPROPID_IsDocDataInitialized before Getting DocData #71102
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Make postfix `for` and `forr` snippets available for types with `Length` or `Count` property #71748
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce ImmutableArray allocations around AssemblyIdentity #71783
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: synthesize single-element list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update our syntax list types to be "collection builder" types. #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Upstream changes from Vertical Build PoC #71666
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator not generating event field modifiers correctly #71739
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Make dynamic nullable if its type was annotated to be nullable when generating its type syntax #71813
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.10
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only parse a single document when freezing documents with related linked files #71750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
